#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int min(int a,int b)
{
	return(a<=b)?a:b;
}

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int e,f;
        cin>>e>>f;
        int W=f-e;
        int n;
        cin>>n;
        int val[n],wt[n];
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            cin>>val[i]>>wt[i];
        }
        int k[W+1];k[0]=0;
        for(int i=1;i<=W;i++)
        k[i]=-1;
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
        	for(int w=0;w<=W;w++)
        	{
        		if(k[w]!=-1 && w+wt[i]<=W)
        		{
        			if(k[w+wt[i]]==-1)
        			k[w+wt[i]]=k[w]+val[i];
        			else
        			k[w+wt[i]]=min(k[w]+val[i],k[w+wt[i]]);
        		}
        	}
        }
        if(k[W]!=-1)
        cout<<"The minimum amount of money in the piggy-bank is "<<k[W]<<"."<<endl;
        else
         cout<<"This is impossible."<<endl;
        
    }


}
